quote: That was a good day for me,"" Skulduggery said. ""I didn't have to hit anyone. I didn't have to shoot anyone. I just sat around and talked to my good friend and partner, Valkyrie Cain.
quote_letters: THAT WAS A GOOD DAY FOR ME SKULDUGGERY SAID I DIDNT HAVE TO HIT ANYONE I DIDNT HAVE TO SHOOT ANYONE I JUST SAT AROUND AND TALKED TO MY GOOD FRIEND AND PARTNER VALKYRIE CAIN
